# MISC::IS_SNIPER_INVERTED

## Summary
Checks if teh sniper rifle control is inverted

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This function is hard-coded to always return 0.
